name: Bubba Sparxxx
description:
'''Warren Anderson Mathis''' (born March 6, 1977), better known by his stage name '''Bubba Sparxxx''', is an American rapper. His 2001 [[Single (music)|single]], "[[Ugly (Bubba Sparxxx song)|Ugly]]" (featuring [[Timbaland]]) peaked at number 15 on the [[Billboard Hot 100|''Billboard'' Hot 100]] and led him to sign with Timbaland's Beat Club Records, an imprint of [[Interscope Records]] to release his debut studio album, ''[[Dark Days, Bright Nights]]'' (2001). Met with critical and commercial success, it peaked at number three on the [[Billboard 200|''Billboard'' 200]].

His second album, ''[[Deliverance (Bubba Sparxxx album)|Deliverance]]'' (2003) was met with further critical acclaim, while his third, ''[[The Charm (Bubba Sparxxx album)|The Charm]]'' (2006)—released by [[Big Boi]]'s [[Purple Ribbon Records]], an imprint of [[Virgin Records]]—yielded the single "[[Ms. New Booty]]" (featuring [[Ying Yang Twins]] and [[Mr. Collipark]]), which peaked at number seven on the ''Billboard'' Hot 100. This marked final release on a major label, and his subsequent releases delved further into [[country rap]].
